attributes.action: Since we, the taxpayers through the government, now own Northern Rock, we petition the Prime Minister to make arrangements for the return to each of us our individual share holding in, and/or any guarantees to, the nationalised company within twelve months.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The presence of this huge percentage of the Gross Domestic Product as a support to Northern Rock will hazard expenditure on government commitments to other spending departments. By returning individual taxpayers' stakes in the company in this way, the government will be taking the right action to return the company to its rightful place in the private sector speedily and minimise further costs to the exchequer.

Considerations with regard to other interested parties should take second place in any business plan for the operation.
